Un juego de puzzles maravilloso con una mecánica innovadora y un diseño de niveles exquísito. No es complicado pero si lo es en sus niveles avanzados y conseguir las medallas de oro en los retos será una gran proeza. Mi juego favorito y en mi opinión, perfecto en todos los sentidos.

a concept test turned phenomenon, the creation of the portal gun was a stroke of genius, the game they made around it was simple yet challenging. iintroducing another silent protagonist and a psychotic Ai. Valve certainly know how to make characters.. i hear a sequel is in the making.

that being said, if you have never played this or Portal 2 before, buy it and have fun

Still alive...

"First I'm here, then I'm over there! It's amazing!" 10/10

Everything that you've heard about 'Portal' is true. Well, if you've heard nothing but great things about it, that is. Because this is easily one of the greatest puzzle games to ever be created. Hell, it may even be one of the greatest games created, period. It's like 'Half Life 2' but on crack! You thought crack was bad for you, didn't you? Well it turns out that crack is good when combined with elements of puzzle solving and first person shooters. 'Portal' may be short, but it's pretty damn cheap too. And when you take into consideration the difficulty of the added challenges after you've completed the story, it should take a decent amount of time to complete. Nevertheless, it's refreshing to see a first person 'shooter' without bullets and if you haven't picked this game up, along with the rest of the 'Orange Box', that's something that you should probably be doing right about now.
An old time classic. Would reccomend this to any fan of puzzle games or good storylines.

It's also short too, but it's still an addicting game. I 100% recommend this.

A cube made me cry
10/10

Portal é diferente e inovador. O jogo é uma mistura de puzzle (quebra cabeça) e ação. Ele se passa no mesmo universo de Half-Life. A protagonista chama-se Chell e ela é muda, o enredo do jogo é basicamente contado por uma "voz" chamada GLaDOS, que dá instruções para a protagonista. Pelo fato da protagonista não falar, pode parecer que o jogo tem um enrredo disperso, mas a história vai ficando cada vez mais interessante, até chegar em um final surpreendente.

A Chell usa a "portal gun", que é uma arma que lança um portal azul e um laranja, para passar pelas câmaras do jogo.
A dificuldade, no começo é muito baixa, e vai aumentando bastante conforme você avança.
Eu não vi nenhum bug no decorrer da campanha. A trilha sonora do jogo é muito boa, dando destaque para a música 'Still Alive' que é cantada pela GLaDOS nos créditos do jogo.
O jogo é curto, dá zerá-lo em uma média de 3hs, em uma segunda jogatina esse tempo diminui muito.
Os gráficos do jogo são consideravelmente bons, levando em consideração o ano do lançamento.
O jogo tem uns desafios extras, como passar por uma câmara usando poucos portais, dando poucos passos ou em pouco tempo. E também tem as câmaras avançadas, que são as do modo campanha com a dificuldade aumentada.


Portal é um dos melhores jogos de puzzles de todos os tempos e o preço do jogo é muito bom, a Valve fez mais um jogo com qualidade extrema, vale cada centavo.

This is the best puzzle game I've played, albeit not many. The small bits of lore and information of the outside world made me want to keep exploring and learning more about the world. The puzzles started off easy introducing basics but soon became complex and challenging, at least for me. Love this game and cannot recommend more. Only downside is that it is VERY short as in 2-3 hours short. !!! MUST OWN !!!
Needs no more praise! It has already enough. I swear, if you don't play this even once, you must learn to give Valve a chance to correct their mistakes.

11/10 experience

I wouldn't recommend this game under normal circumstances, but I paid $2.50 for this game and it's definitely worth that. Amazing mechanics, interesting antagonist, but there's no one else in the game except you and you don't talk. The humor is perfectly dark and sarcastic, and the puzzles are challenging so it may take a bit to figure them out, but leave satisfaction to make it worth your while. I finished it in just 2 hours, but it's worth a few bucks, mainly for the storyline.

2007年にリリースされた時は非常に革新的な内容でゲーム関連の賞を総なめにしたゲームです。
主な目的はパズルを解いて出口を目指すことですが、アクションやストーリーを追う楽しさもふんだんにあり、パズルゲームが苦手な人でも入り込みやすい作りになっていると思います。

I would highly reccommend this game if you like solving puzzles. If you don't then this game is definitely not for you. I was inclined to try this game because I'd heard so many good things about it and it's story line. It's interesting because through out the game while being tested GLaDOS is constantly misinforming you and toying with your mind. You begin to really question the "information" she gives you and you wonder why you are testing. Once you reach the end of the game many of those questions are ansewred and many more arise. In short I play on playing the sequel because I enjoyed this one so much.

Все мы знаем, что Valve не делают плохих игр и Portal одна из них, хотя бы по тому, что мир Portal и мир Halfe Life тесно связаны. Эта игра, это одна большая головоломка с множеством комнат которых очень интересно проходить. Великолепная злодейка ГлэДос постоянно, что-то говорит и за сюжетом увлекательно следить, НО только на английском, русская озвучка ОТВРАТИТЕЛЬНА! Не смотря на всю гениальность проекта, я бы сказал, что комнаты начинают надоедать уже после первого часа игры своим однообразием картинки и игра ОЧЕНЬ коротка. Мне игра понравилась, но дайте НЕМного больше разнообразия и по длиньше игру и будет здорова. 7 из 10

I saw all my friends playing this game, and I secretly thought to myself, "How can people like a stupid PUZZLE game?!". At the time I had wanted Half-Life 2 and the Episodes, and I bought the Orange Box to satisfy that desire. When I read that it came with Portal, I thought that I would see what the game was all about, and what was behind the hype for it. When I played it, I FELL IN LOVE. I thought "How could I have never played a game of such quality before? This is AMAZING!" I realized that Portal and the second are much, MUCH more than a puzzle game, and now I am desperate to aquire the second game. I definitely reccomend this game to all who have had the same feelings for the game as I once had, because when you actually play it, I guarantee you will love it!

There are currently around 16,000 reviews of Portal on Steam. I suspect there are very very few people who have a Steam account and still haven't played it.

So, if you're one of the seven people who don't actually have a copy, and are still undecided, know this. It's good. Very very good.

I originally bought the Orange Box for the next episodic installment of Half-Life 2, and knew absolutely nothing about Portal. I certainly wasn't interested in Team Fortress, as I don't play multiplayer games. So, having completed the Half-Life 2 episode, I thought I'd give this a try. Hmm. A puzzle game using the Source engine. No guns, next to no plot and very little in the way of pretty graphics. Didn't sound that interesting, but since I'd already bought it I might as well play it.

Wow. I doubt there is anybody who doesn't yet know the twist, but suffice to say the writing in this game is absolutely top notch. It's witty, brilliantly acted, absolutely thrilling and a delight to play from beginning to end. Sure, you can finish it a couple of hours, but it's excellent and you won't regret it.

J'avais découvert Portal dans l'Orange box lors de sa sortie sur un autre format. Avec le temps je me demandais si le plaisirs de jeu restait intact malgré les années et la réponse est oui ! Portal nous prend par la main au début du jeu afin de bien comprendre les mécanismes du gameplay, l'IA qui nous parle est drôle et bienveillante (du moins au début pour la gentillesse). Ce jeu dispose d'une ambiance unique que l'on apprécie grandement au casque, ça ne sert à rien de spoiler l'histoire vu que le jeu est assez court. Portal est unique, vous ne retrouverez pas cette ambiance et ce type de dialogue ailleurs. Une grosse bulle d'air dans le paysage vidéoludique.

9/10

I'm more than sure most people won't agree with this review. And that's alright, just remember this is my personal opinion, before coming swearing at me..
I might have a problem, but for God's love, Valve, I just can't taste this game. At all. I have finished the entire campaign, done all advanced chambers and I'm now trying to complete the challenges, just so I can uninstall this game with all achievements.
The storyline was just SO horrible and unimpressive, while I was told by everyone it is amazing..
The gameplay was nothing that impressive and revolutionary, as, again, people always tend to say. Yes, physics were very good and accurate, but they're all for this game. I don't find physics enough for a good game.
The final boss was probably easier than a kids' game. Not to mention nothing epic happened even at the end..
[b]TL;DR[/b] I REALLY tried to give this game a chance! As you can see I haven't uninstalled it yet even after completing, because I keep trying to find that ''something'' everyone says this game has. But it's never coming, so I decided to write this 100% honest personal rating. I'm sorry for the purchase.

[b][u]Pros:[/u][/b] +physics (but on the ''step count'' challenge, there are numerous flaws and bugs with it)

[b][u]Cons:[/u][/b] -very boring and bad-made storyline; uninteresting characters, concept and plot; not to mention the awful ending..
          -the voice-acting!! horrible as in Team Fortress, I'm sorry but I have to say it (GladOS' voice kept making me turn off the volume and say ''Kill it with fire'';
          -it tried to make jokes; it -SO- failed;

Depressing.
Personal rating: 43/100 - Bad

Portal to specyficzna gra logiczna studia Valve, znanego przede wszystkim ze wspaniałego serwisu Steam. Grę charakteryzuje głównie nastawienie na rozwiązywanie zagadek, jednocześnie unikając śmierci na różne, czasami dziwaczne sposoby.  

FABUŁA 
Zaczynając grę, pojawiamy się w tajemniczym miejscu, które z początku sprawia wrażenie futurystycznego wiezięnia(tak odczułem to ja). Od naszych pierwszych postawionych kroków towarzyszy nam głos, który po części pomaga nam odnaleźć się w tym otoczeniu. Gra ma kilkanaście poziomów, które sprytnie podzielono na pomieszczenia, a w każdym z nich czekają na nas coraz trudniejsze zagadki. Wraz z posuwaniem się do przodu odkrywamy jednak - po części przez wspomniany wcześniej głos - że coś tu nie gra...Fabuła jest naprawdę niecodzienna, im dalej jesteśmy w grze, tym bardziej chcemy dowiedzieć się co nas czeka za rogiem co tylko napędza naszą chęć do dalszej gry. Kilka momentów naprawdę może utknąć nam w pamięci i za to należy się twórcom wielki plus. 

ROZGRYWKA 
Jeśli chodzi o pomysły rozgrywki zastosowane w grze, największą zaletą jest Portal Gun, o którym słyszeli nawet Ci, którzy nigdy nie grali w Portal. To przede wszystkim dzięki niemu rozwiązujemy większość zagadek lub po prostu się nim bawimy. Mówiąc o rozgrywce, należy również wspomnieć o zastosowaniu praw fizycznych - znaczna część zagadek opiera się głównie na zabawie z grawitacją czy prędkością.  

GRAFIKA 
Grafika tak naprawdę ma tutaj niewielkie znaczenie. Każde z pomieszczeń wygląda bardzo podobnie i mimo upływu ponad 7 lat nie mam jej nic większego do zarzucenia. Wszystko co mogłoby być upiększone, zostało upiększone w sequelu.  
DŹWIĘK 
Oprawa muzyczna nie jest szczególnie bogata w dźwięki, lecz nie jest też wykonana byle jak. Po prostu jest taka, jaka powinna być w tego typu grze, dobrze wprowadza nas w klimat tej gry. 

OSIĄGNIĘCIA 
I tutaj grzechem jest nie wspomnieć o wyzwaniach poza główną fabułą gry. Samą grę ukończyłem w około 4 godziny, natomiast zdobycie wszystkich osiągnięć zajęło mi około 12 godzin gry. Wniosek? 3 osiągnięcia zajmują mniej więcej tyle czasu niż przejście fabuły i zdobycie 12 pozostałych osiągnięć. Te pozostałe nie są już tak trudne, są dosyć przyjemne a połowę z nich zdobywamy podczas przejścia gry.
 
PODSUMOWANIE 
Portal to nietypowa gra logiczna, z naprawdę ciekawą fabułą, w której twórcy idealnie zastosowali wrażenie, że jesteśmy królikiem doświadczalnym jakiejś wielkiej maszynerii. Grze tak naprawdę nie mam nic większego do zarzucenia, ocena w większości pochodzi stąd, iż nie przepadam za grami z tego gatunku, ale jeśli ktoś uwielbia gry logiczne, będzie miał bardzo miłe wspomnienia po ukończeniu jej. 


NA PLUS: 
- zastosowanie Portal Guna 
-naprawdę wciągająca fabuła 
-fantastyczne zakończenie(cake!) 

NA MINUS: 
całkowita liniowość 
 
 
OCENA: 7.4/10
A bit short but really fun and a pretty great story!
i hat playing this game it's too hard and i dont even care for the extra levels.
Игра хорошая жалоб нет
Loved this on Xbox 360. Still love it when played through again on PC. Awesome few hours of puzzles.

Der Anfang einer Legende.
Der erste Teil hier ist sehr kurz zeigt aber wie unglaublich gut der 2te Teil wird. Das KOMPLETT neue Spielgefühl und Design ist einfach großartig sowie einzigartig. Eines der besten Spiele und das beste Puzzlegame!

pro:
+Atmosphäre
+Grafik(zumindest Früher)
+Glados(einfach ein spitzen Charakter
+Gameplay

con:
-Spielzeit
